g.text: x = node X offline and out of the cluster
X = node X online and its RA not-starting|stopped
X^ = node X online and its RA starting
X" = node X online and its RA started (i.e. etcd instance running)
rev_x = etcd revision on node X
RA = etcd Resource Agent controlling etcd instance
Both X and Y online, and both
RA started, running etcd in sync
RA on X detects that RA on Y has
started, so a cluster must exist
already. RA on X can only join.
RA on Y detects e-quorum is lost
2. RA on Y prepares to force a new cluster
even though in a degraded state
RA on X makes etcd leave
RA on Y adds X back
RA on X starts etcd as a
RA on X syncs and is promoted
X and Y are unable to communicate
Both nodes try fencing each other
RA on X could not make etcd leave
RA on Y forces new etcd cluster
RA on Y adds X as learning member
